page.title: 05RECREATION ON WATER
page.content: The River Calder flows through this area. The Calder and Hebble Navigation runs alongside it for much of the way, whilst the Brookfoot Marina lies nearby, North West of Brighouse. Leisure activities include boating, mainly on narrow boats, angling for coarse fish on both canal and river, trout fishing on the Marina canoeing, water skiing and wind surfing. Narrow boats are approximately 1O metres long and 2 metres wide. Two of them can fit side by side into the locks. Many of the old narrow boats have been carefully restored and brightly decorated with the tradition- -al castles and roses. Angling is mainly controlled by a small number of local angling clubs, who organise contests during the angling season.
